author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Remove overlaps from the V18ng scenario by making special treatments to HD2 and HD3 partial wafers

#### PR validation:

Use the Geant4 overlap testing tool

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx364M Remove overlaps from the V18ng scenario by making special treatments to HD2 and HD3 partial wafers
